question: The Ozone2Climate Technology Roadshow was organished in _____________.
explanation: The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change, along with the UN Environment OzonAction's Compliance Assistance Programme, organized an "Ozone2Climate" Technology Roadshow in Agra. The Technology Roadshow was organized for the first time as part of the annual network meeting for Ozone Officers of South Asia. It had 13 exhibitors that promoted ozone and climate-friendly alternative technologies to HCFCs and HFCs in the refrigeration and air-conditioning (RAC) sector.
